articles.title: July is Dry Eye Awareness month: Resources from Prevent Blindness - Ophthalmology Times Europe
articles.description: Educational resources include handouts, videos and a dedicated webpage on the proper way to use eye drops
articles.content: July is Dry Eye Awareness Month, and Prevent Blindness is helping ophthalmologists educate patients and healthcare professionals on the disease, which significantly impacts patients' functional visio… [+3154 chars]
